content:
IntegerProperty Enum

Definition

Identifies the integer properties of a visual style element.

In this Article

public enum IntegerProperty
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
IntegerProperty

Remarks

The IntegerProperty enumeration represents a set of integer properties that describe visual style elements. The IntegerProperty values are used as an argument in the GetInteger method to specify which property value to retrieve for the element that the VisualStyleRenderer currently represents.

Fields

AlphaLevel

The alpha value for an icon, between 0 and 255.
AlphaThreshold

The minimum alpha value of a solid pixel, between 0 and 255.
BorderSize

The size of the border line for elements with a filled-border background.
GlyphIndex

The index into the font for font-based glyphs.
GradientRatio1

The amount of stem.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ColorProperty.GradientColor1 to use in a color gradient. The sum of the five GradientRatio properties must equal 255.
GradientRatio2

The amount of stem.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ColorProperty.GradientColor2 to use in a color gradient. The sum of the five GradientRatio properties must equal 255.
GradientRatio3

The amount of stem.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ColorProperty.GradientColor3 to use in a color gradient. The sum of the five GradientRatio properties must equal 255.
GradientRatio4

The amount of stem.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ColorProperty.GradientColor4 to use in a color gradient. The sum of the five GradientRatio properties must equal 255.
GradientRatio5

The amount of stem.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ColorProperty.GradientColor5 to use in a color gradient. The sum of the five GradientRatio properties must equal 255.
Height

The height of an element.
ImageCount

The number of state images in multiple-image file.
MinDpi1

The minimum dots per inch (DPI) that stem.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty.ImageFile1 was designed for.
MinDpi2

The minimum DPI that stem.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty.ImageFile2 was designed for.
MinDpi3

The minimum DPI that stem.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty.ImageFile3 was designed for.
MinDpi4

The minimum DPI that stem.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty.ImageFile4 was designed for.
MinDpi5

The minimum DPI that stem.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FilenameProperty.ImageFile5 was designed for.
ProgressChunkSize

The size of progress bar elements.
ProgressSpaceSize

The size of spaces between progress bar elements.
RoundCornerHeight

A percentage value that represents the height of a rounded corner, from 0 to 100.
RoundCornerWidth

A percentage value that represents the width of a rounded corner, from 0 to 100.
Saturation

The amount of saturation for an image, between 0 and 255.
TextBorderSize

The size of the border around text characters.
TrueSizeStretchMark

A percentage value indicating how far a fixed-size element will stretch when the target exceeds the source.
Width

The width of an element.
